ygData.subject: RE: L46 weapon effectiveness.
ygData.msgSnippet: Absolutely for solo work, not sure about a group situation though. ... From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@sba.uwm.edu] Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 11:30 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Absolutely for solo work, not sure about a group situation though.

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 11:30 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] L46 weapon effectiveness.


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

Why not have both?

Syl

-----Original Message-----
From: Peck White [mailto:pwhite@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 9:54 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] L46 weapon effectiveness.

From: Peck White <pwhite@...>

AoE and runners are not a problem, Chains if it is. This
way I figure I'm
giving the equivalent of a 30% haste to the entire group,
rather than a 20%
haste to just myself.
